flawed_nl_solution:
Debelyn had 20 - 2 = <<20-2=17>>17 dolls left after giving out 2 dolls to Christel.
Christel had 24 - 5 = <<24-5=19>>19 dolls after giving Andrena 5 dolls.
So, Andrena has 19 +2 = <<19+2=21>>21 dolls now.
Therefore, Andrena has 21 - 17 = <<21-17=4>>4 more dolls than Debelyn.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 17. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
